errors.error_description: The text states that Menpo strictly requires Python 3.7, which contradicts the badges indicating support for Python 3.6-3.9.
correction_candidates: Remove the sentence 'Please note that Menpo strictly requires Python 3.7.' and change the Python 3.7 badge to a Python 3.6 badge.
Remove the sentence 'Please note that Menpo strictly requires Python 3.7.'.
Change the sentence to 'Please note that Menpo works best with Python 3.7.'.
Remove the Python 3.6, 3.8, and 3.9 badges, leaving only the Python 3.7 badge.
errors.golden_answer: Remove the sentence 'Please note that Menpo strictly requires Python 3.7.'.
